VDX8xA3vukM3sJ9IcPp_pQ.text: The food and service were both excellent.  We had the Chickenstein pizza and got half chicken and half shrimp as toppings.  The sauce was really good and it was a nice way to "think out of the box" so to speak with pizza.  The only thing missing for this dining experience were TV sets and a better bar selection.  Having a variety of alcohol available and TV sets on would make Wolfman a real go-to place for having food and fun.  The staff members were friendly and gave top-notch service.  Giving them more fun options available with the bar and TV viewing would really help them shine.

G5n0YV3YnDDRH02MsCdp3A.text: Terrible pizza. Smells and tastes like dominos. Not worth the money. The bread is the worst part.

w1arDW48zRz2zQTqRJz-7g.text: I am new to the Charlotte area and I wanted really good pizza. I searched on yelp and almost went some where else but based on these reviews I want to wolf man pizza and I'm happy I did! I ordered the month special and it was good! Good flavor, sauce and amount of toppings. Just disappointed I didn't order the largest size so I could have leftovers for the next day! I will be coming back and will refer my friends and family.

VGKBi6vGf24OXduvYENYdA.text: Awesome pizza! Me and my boyfriend both loved the crust! I was obsessed with my Bella pizza, the veggies were fresh and delicious! The cheese was a creamy incredible blend! My boyfriends five meat was loaded with his fav meats! Great options for the vegetarians and the meat eaters!

1xg7IvwIO9a6TKS6V7JFRg.text: They have such a great selection of pizzas to choose from, which from what I have tried, all taste amazing!  They also have a great dining ambience with a great selection of beer to match!

gA0EhIFU_D5DBb2LwefLCw.text: Daughter ordered GLUTEN free pizza and was given regular pizza. She was told by the server it was gluten-free. For her, eating GF is medically necessary, not a trend. Called upon discovery of this serious mistake. Manager was polite but completely unconcerned. He also had no understanding of consequences of food allergies. Great regular pizza but poor service and a dangerous error. Just a heads up since they offer a GF menu.

prn6KgrFYlo2-PCIh-U_Hg.text: Happy Holidays!  I know it's been a while since I've wrote but it is the holidays & I've stayed very busy with them.  Hope everyone had a great holiday as I did.    So let's talk about a pizzeria I ate at during the holidays...Wolfman Pizza at Quail Corners on Park Road.  At first look, it looked like a small, empty place as I walked by to do a little shopping.  But when I walked inside, it was actually full; the seating can't be seen as the booths are further in and tall.  Luckily a booth was empty, even though I was by myself, I need my space :)  The place is small but they do make the most of it.  With a few tables up front, several large booths, and even bar style seating with a great view of the pizzas being cooked.    A family friendly place, on this night, you saw a variety of people from elders, to young kids, to the high school/college crowd.   The menu is unique, printed on a newspaper, with a variety of pizza toppings.  "The Laboratory" section of the menu allows you to create your own unique pie from the sauce, to the crust, to the variety of cheeses.  Want a Black Bean sauce pie with Bleu Cheese & Bean Sprouts...it's yours here!  Since it was my veggie day, I tried the White Wolf pizza.  The 10 in pizza arrived & was delish!  Garlic butter, New York style crust, with mozzarella/parmesan/Swiss cheeses, topped with Roma tomatoes minus the basil!  The size was just right, though I couldn't finish it.  One thing I didn't care for was all the oil...it was everywhere.  A little paper napkin to soak it up & I was good.  The cheese was oozing everywhere...the way I like it .  On tap, local beers which I think is great!  I enjoyed a nice NoDa ale, a little darker than I expected but still good. $ is good too...I recommend you try if you're a pizza lover!

1-X89C4up3edtnx_f3B_yg.text: i order from them sometimes. the food is great salads pizza and chicken wings. the price is a bit higher than other places but it is worth it.

vrzVq4SdM9XXTiv-u9r69Q.text: love wolfman pizza. everything is pretty good, any pizza you get, you cant go wrong, i recently tried the thai pizza and enjoyed it. great service, very very quick delivery, they are great! clean inside and polite servers. only complaints to say, the one time ive eaten inside i wanted pizza and sticks my friend wanted to add a salad too and ordering everything individually was costly, however after paying, we saw a sign for a lunch special that the waitress never mentioned.... the lunch special was exactly what we would have ordered... if we had known... i cant deduct a star bc of one waitress though. Ive also had the wings which i didnt like... they r baked, but i got buffalo with barely any buffalo sauce so if u like them saucy ask for extra! and personally the wings werent cooked enough for me, they should go about it a different way. noone likes soggy wings. but overall, great place, great pizza, awesome on delivery too!

Wcb7U8QXGJwwK2axRAtIAQ.text: This place has excellent pizza! If you like pizza with pineapple, I highly recommend the Maui. The inside was super cute and I love how you can see them making your pizza. Everyone that works there was very nice and our waitress was great! Can't wait to come back for some more!

87In6a40nSUqqLTvtWiZDw.text: First when I went to order a meatball hero, I was told they dont do those. The young lady seemed off a bit. So I explained they did have them and call them a hoagie. She said it soul be a 15 minute wait, no problem but when I was signing the sarge she seemed put off. Had I tipped I woudl have put in a few dollars from my bag. So I waited and when I got home the cheese was not even melted. What was the 15 minute wait for. The tase was not that good for 20.00.. Was just a bit disappointed  with the whole experience, the sauce, the staff. The place looks nice though.

nyDbh84kU4u_OhDN48ASVw.text: I am a total Wolfman Pizza fan!  Great ingredients, pizza is always fresh tasting, the Styx are delish!  Nothing crazy there except that they give you 3 different dipping sauces, which makes these Styx the best!  My 6'4" BF and I usually share a medium pizza and an app of some kind and it is always a good amount of food without feeling too stuffed.  The New York is yummy, and the Big Bad Wolf is my fav.  Enjoy!

SbQv9gc4r_Xy9qhLsqwbLg.text: The "Big Bad Wolf" pizza is so good we got it again and again. Never had a pizza here we didn't like but the side salads definitely leave something to be desired (a whole mini carrot- no good).

BSBV9Y9bxRU79PWrAYxEPw.text: This is a really interesting place. Decor is super cool, wolfs/wolf men pics all over, even some carvings. You can see them cooking/flipping pizzas/dough which is cool but also the reason they got a 4. They don't have much counter space, and anyone who had longer hair was just wearing a baseball cap, so that didn't seem very sanitary. Now about the pizzas.. We got the cheeseburger and a veggie. Cheeseburger actually tasted like a cheeseburger, and it seemed like there was mustard and other cheeseburger seasonings in the sauce!! Didn't even try the veggie, just filled up on cheeseburger. Good place for dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu-cool
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Kids cheese pizza

WgBRvLjJv1HNjA81CraQpA.text: This Wolfman location was my first, hopefully of many, visits to the small chain. I'm so accustomed to the pizza/bar setup with good food, kitschy interior, massive TVs with ESPN streaming and an overt amount of sprinting youths. This location feels more like a quick service pizza joint with service at the tables, draught beer, and an open kitchen.   Made it in for a late Sunday lunch and had a great time. Cozy booths line the wall, big cushy stools at the bar, and fun decor abounds. We grabbed a big booth for the two of us. The menu is printed like a newspaper and makes for a memorable read-through. Tons of sandwiches, pastas, pizzas, and all of the usual suspects for apps. We started with some "Styx." Breadsticks with sundried tomato pesto, marinara, and creamy artichoke dip. All dips were spot on, the sticks were seasoned heavily, but balanced, and they certainly didn't last long. 6 comes in an order and is a perfect serving for two.   Our server was very gracious with our vegan order, too. We ordered the veggie pizza with no cheese and also a buffalo chicken....with no chicken or the typical cheeses. Nothing of note for the meat-eater/dairy-lover, but was rather fulfilling for us. It's rather pleasant to visit a restaurant that doesn't balk at a diet-specific order and is rather generous with the time and consideration. Very humbling. The crust is fantastic and I'd imagine is equally notable for other pies.   Prices are fair and definitely worth their weight. I'm looking forward to visiting this location or one of the others around town soon. Cheers, Wolfman!

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Vegan buffalo pizza
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Little Red Riding Hood etching in the front bench. So cool!

QNh0CwgYr4BzEl3ushZGcQ.text: Very Good Pizza with POOR Dessert options!  Brand New or Newly Remodeled!     Since I do not Read Menus well they gave me a "Silver Bulletine"  Newspaper about Happenings with Warewoofs!  If you are a Warewoof someone is hunting you and I would watch it!  OK this was mostly a Menu which was harder to understand than the other kind and maybe I'm not real good at reading anythinj other than Pictures and some GREAT Reviews on yelp, the ones written by Friends (someones Friends, right).  You KNOW I LOVE YOU!!!  Who ever though of "Build Your Own" must have known someone like me... Except I usually have CHEESE, Tomato Sauce and Crust... If a plain Cheese Pizza is Good, then......  Since I have eaten this Pizza in other places I knew it was good...  Fresh Basil (turned out Crunchy, still very Good) Red Onion, Sausage, Normal Pizza Sauce (just like I remember and Very Good)... Until last night It has been years since I have had a PIE for the Woofman.  Dessert...Hummmm, How do I word this?  S'mores Pizza... Before I say Two and a Half yelp stars, I'll call it a Poor Dessert to Bare the name S'mores!!!  NOTE to the Owners***  On this Dessert and on your Dessert one person is saying right here..."Go back to the Drawing Board" or, OR Ignore me... I'll still eat your Pizza and go somewhere else for Dessert!  I'm NOT mad... This is a NOTE to help YOU! Woof!  I'll go somewhere and learn to use spellject!  Appetizers? Hummm... Last Night I was HUNGRY and really wanted something, Appetizer or two before the Pizza... Instead of making a second note to the owners, I'll ask someone else to make some CREATIVE and Delicius Pre-Meal options, ideas so the Woofman can eat the competition, not that he could not anyway (being a Woof)... Pretzels come to mind!  Thinly Sliced ONION Rings like the Cow Fish Onion Straws.... Something from a Great Horror Movie or an Idea for the Next Horror Movie to come out in the Spring!  Woof... these are the clues: "Hot" Sweet Potato Chips (NOT reheated - Made-to-order) or Zoo-kini (Zucchini) Chips (like at Nolen Kitchen) or how about Bacon Wrapped, Sausage Stuffed Jalapenos with Bacon Marmalade Dipping Sauce!!!  Very Good Service!  Most of the Servers are VERY Good with Children...They took GREAT Care of me!!!   No Way this is a Sports Bar, right? ? ?  Place looks GREAT...Like Chucky Cheese for Adults with a lot of kids too!  Warewoofs photos aretalt over this placet... Serious about the Woofs!  Warhol or Warholesk Woofman Art!  I LIKE it A lot!  Ricciocho ask me to catch a Coyote pup so he could "Raise it as a Dog"... I told him "It does NOT work that way"!

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. 55 says he thinks it is a &#39;57 Ford Wagon?
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Woofmobile
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu posing as&#34;The Silver Bulletin&#34;

t4Gn8r_kIwAZwrKaO3e5Ew.text: Visiting the area from CA...called in order togo to take back to my room. Get there and apparently they gave someone else my order..wth?! Had to wait another 20 minutes while we had ice creAm melting in the car..so fun. Pizza was aight but that just pissed me off.  Guy did say well they'll probably come back for right order and i could get another pizza for free. Like seriously i don't even know what the other person may have done with it....so guy came back to get his right order and got my pizza for free

7ol5hFSCQIiFCrW-8LU1WA.text: Delicious pizza, relaxed and friendly vibe, great beer selection. If you haven't tried Wolfman yet, you owe it to yourself to give it a go!

KRWlfwdjwlmVJFLzDgwDrA.text: we ordered a take out from Wolfman. we had their fanous Bella Lugosi, pizza with thing crust and veggies. the pizza was awesome, crispy, tasty veggies, not greasy. Well done!

o0txIUO2jwI8C-xAuXBBTw.text: Got pizza delivered, perfect portion size for one. They have a ton of vegetarian options, which is great for me!

dvi7uyoBsN-Ule6apflieQ.text: GREAT pizza!! Nice beer selection too. Also got a meatball sub. Found my new pizza joint!!

rFUVg4O1xGkapYy1PajVTg.text: Best pizza I've ever had!! Hand down! NY has nothing on this place. Excellent pizza made in very creative manner. They make me like food combinations and pizzas I never liked!! Service is great. Had Blue moo, Maui (several times), BBQ chick and a few more.

D_L8QJ-Xf50pIO0Vv4-PBw.text: I love this place. I've been a handful of times now and it's always delicious.  They have some unique combinations and always use fresh ingredients.  They call it "california style," however I think it's better than most of the pizza that I ate when I lived in San Diego for a few years.  Always local beers on tap and they run some specials sometimes.  At Quail Corners the patio seems to be dog friendly, so that's a big plus.

qhO8MgRLltDzDC75BfN_1A.text: Delicious pizza. I recommend the Styx with the dips.  I wish they would go back to having beer specials, but it is nice that they have all local beers on tap for $4.50 when the rest of the city charges more.   Very happy otherwise and the staff was excellent

BemUrv6mUqza4Q-WbsTmvg.text: We ordered carryout, so I can't really vouch either way for the service in-house (although the servers I met were extremely nice for the brief time I was there, and the decor was fun). We ordered their supreme pizza and bbq chicken. Both were fairly good, with above average quality toppings but a sadly average crust. Overall, this is definitely better than your average mega chain pizza place.   PS: they have a special every month: on the night of a full moon, all large pizzas are $12.

AZeVk5JHlK7QPAmipg4Ykg.text: This is easily my favorite pizza place in Charlotte. The BBQ chicken pizza is hands down the best that I've ever had. Nothing that I've ever had from Wolfman has been bad. My parents visited and we ordered from here and they loved it just as well.

D22WK4gI0YdieWOYJTZQfA.text: I really like the changes and new location within the shopping center. Seriously delicious pizzas and good service. Much smaller space than the original, but I like that it's not so "sports bar" oriented. A few booths, some bar seating, and a more modern interior. When we went, it had only been open a few days, so they were working out some kinks. I hope that the patrons of the previous location flock back in.   Back when I was eating meat, I remember loving the Cheeseburger Cheeseburger pizza. So good. The salads are also top notch. I saw a couple of local beers on draught...always something I appreciate.  All in all, for good pizza and a pleasant atmosphere, this place wins. I hope they do well in the new space!

qECOY6-3fdV9LZFwXuv6Lw.text: Love this place! GREAT salads, always come in a chilled bowl with plenty of toppings and dressing made in house. I have never dealt with an unpleasant staff member and their pick up orders are quick and hot when you receive them.

YHkbfqYm3JlAQdrylvYhWA.text: Been here a bunch of times at this point. Food is fantastic. Only bummer is dessert menu stinks.

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. The New Mexico
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Grrrr yummy California Chicken Club Panini. grilled chicken breast, bacon crumbles, spinach, diced tomatoes, and provolone
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States

UGPr3UqRGDXpnaYS6tj98w.text: This place is the best. I come here regularly and the food and service is always amazing. If you want good pizza and a good environment check this place out.

GA75O7cGbTb7JfmY10_wsQ.text: Why haven't I had this before? Idk but I'm glad I tried it. Wolfman pizza was so good. This is half pepperoni &half... I forgot the name but It's Alfredo base with artichokes, red peppers, mushrooms and spinach. It was delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States

flW3Qwp6AdtTQOxuQnuVjQ.text: Took my son for lunch. Fast friendly service. The pizza was very good. We enjoyed our experience.

-wdkCVyrYpkxwJdaTnWSpQ.text: The food is fine but when I called to put in a takeout order they were rude and didn't even apologize for the wait on the phone. And then one person took my order and wasn't very friendly.

pKd5XX9D0oYFCfz5CUdNEw.text: We were so excited to find that Wolfman had reopened so close to us.  We used to frequent the old location on Providence and were so sad when they closed up shop there. The food is so good, the menu is unique but also has the typical staples that you want when visiting a pizza place. Service is always spot on at all Wolfman locations we have been to.   On a mom note- they have high chairs available with straps that are not broken! They have a kids menu (pizza, panini or pasta options) but at 5.99 we choose to share with our two year old rather than to get him his own plate.  The servers were friendly with our kiddo but could work on making sure they don't put hot plates or full drinks within his arms reach.    We will definitely be back again and again!!

N8hC0aXXWXchmgtXn7XA5g.text: This place was low key. I ate pretty good. The waitress I had was pretty dope. Being the only African American in the joint, they made me feel at home. I appreciate the hospitality. The wings were straight up bussin!! I highly recommend this place

eMaHtjgDnLkXihZL9cB-yg.text: BOMB. Absolute fire. Eat this pizza.

zGillxii-jPeG2T6h1C76g.text: Like most of the other reviewers, I'd say this is a pretty solid, horror movie and Wolfman themed pizza place. I've never eaten at this location but have ordered delivery from it what must be 50 times. Service is quick and the guy who usually comes is super cool and brings the pizzas inside for us. Best options are the Veg o Matic (the vegetarian pizza), and the white wolf. A couple things have bothered me about this place for years. The basic pizza sauce is unusual in a bad way. I usually sub the ricotta sauce. They have no concept of extra cheese - if you like a lot of mozzarella, this place is not for you. They steadfastly skimp on cheese even if you order extra cheese. Once I called and ordered extra cheese and they insisted it wasn't necessary because they used a lot of cheese to begin with. Not so - these pizzas are light on cheese. And my third problem is that, much of the time, the people who answer the phone to take orders when you call are not particularly friendly. Still, this is our family's go-to pizza delivery because it is one of only two higher end places that deliver to our neighborhood (the other is Rusty Onion, which I prefer because it is more NY style and has more cheese, but my wife and kids hate), and it is consistent and quite good. Expensive though!

GbCqIfgTCv9SSx5mK9XdTQ.text: My boyfriend and I love Wolfman Pizza. I'm quite surprised it does not have 5 stars.  This our go-to for pizza. Our favorites are the Veg-o-matic and New York, New York. The pizza is always delicious and fresh.

Qrdo8ZQeQ1OXDnHMXW-aEw.text: Cool little pizza place. The food was yummy and the service was excellent. We got the Stix app with pimento cheese, marinara and pesto. We also got the personal pepperoni pizza and the personal buffalo chicken pizza. The pepperoni pizza was loaded with pepperoni. The Buffalo chicken pizza was really good but very very spicey. I love buffalo and spicy things don't normally bother me but this was hot. So hot that your mouth burns for a solid 20 minutes after eating.  The food was really fresh. Relatively fast considering its all made.  To order. Neat atmosphere. The parking lot was difficult to find a space in though.

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buffalo chicken pizza. Minus the carrots and blue cheese.
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Stix app with (left to right) marinara, pimento cheese and pesto. Three sauces come with the app and you can select from a few more.
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States

vBkWDaQBbZLNQPK086SoSQ.text: So far this is my favorite pizza in the Charlotte area. The New York, New York was delicious as was the Buffalo Chicken pizza (surprisingly). The sauces were on point (not sweet like some places) and the dough had great flavor and texture.  PS. Just confirmed that everything is made in-house from the dough to the sauces to the toppings. Bonus points!

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buffalo Chicken Pizza

d3VY3nckiv4GF0yPBvT5vw.text: Wolfman pizza is my personal favorite pizza place in Charlotte... it's California style pizza, so don't expect New York style when you sit down. The best of the best is the Big,Bad Wolf and don't overlook the local beer selection! $4.50 for a full pint of Sugar Creek's Dubbel

BJUxLP2R-0ulE_eX44L8CQ.text: Id give 6 stars if I could but this place is amazing. My family & I frequent this neighborhood pizza joint in a regular basis, even when it's not a full moon. The entire staff is always super friendly & great with my kids. Sally remembers our order every time without skipping a beat. We recommend the Big Bad Wolf pie!!!

SgXX95pWYKMFe_DOf5CWQA.text: My first visit here. Place is happening with good amount of crowd. Tried veggie pizza - tastes good.. No complaints .. But pizza would have more tastier as I tried many local pizzas and tastes better than this.  Careful with the funny sign

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Careful with the sign

V00rFUZ-uTXxbxa_y3GXZQ.text: Wolfbites need to be taken off the menu. The menu said 6 per order "Mozzarella cheese and our secret spicy red sauce served with ranch " for $7.99. What u get is 6 small bread spirals with a little bit of sauce and cheese. It tasted like hot pockets. Nothing was spicy. I honestly didn't know what I was ordering. I should have asked for more details because the description is vague.  I thought I was getting fried cheese bites with spicy red dipping sauce. I like the pizza but save your money and do not order this appetizer.  It's a rip off and it taste bad.

SovPpHGxcxwyqLs3g1iNWg.text: Last night by a (nearly) full moon, we decided to sink our teeth into some Wolfman Pizza, and I'm glad we did. The menu was inventive, the service uber-friendly, and the experience made all the more poignant given the Dominos two doors down.   - We had the Blue Moo (which was on monthly special) and it would have been worth it even if not.  - The place has a cool look and vibe. - The service (as stated) was very welcoming and friendly.  Overall, the crust is a little thicker than I normally choose, but the originality made up for that.

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. The Blue Moo....MOOOOOO!
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. There&#39;s always a full moon to howl at indoors at Wolfman Pizza.

XZTq3pTueHZD6ukx8o_6lA.text: I visited Wolfman Pizza for the first time yesterday to pick up a pizza I ordered online. I was acknowledged as soon as I walked in, and the overall service was quick and effortless. We ordered a pepperoni pizza with mushrooms on half. After a short 5-10 minute ride home, the pizza was incredibly greasy making the crust soggy. I wish it has less pepperoni. Literally, the entire top was covered. After putting the pizza in the over to crisp the soggy crust, it did taste okay, but so so greasy. The beer specials looked great, and maybe eating in provides a higher quality pie, but I don't think i'll be back for pizza. $3 beers are worth it, though.

roVP0YoOdjcwUD0JXSDmZA.text: Their pizza is the best in Charlotte, but for whatever reason, they can't find the magic of royalty.  I wish I knew what they could do to be super successful because their pizza is awesome.

32cf8WdtYgspBWaih4Eyiw.text: Love this place! Super low key and great atmosphere. Almost didn't want to leave a review so people wouldn't know about it . It's a well kept secret! Delicious pizza and the spaghetti & meatballs are great too!

bmR8DUEzHVTm5LQ0m3YcDQ.text: This is probably my favorite pizza spot in South Charlotte, and for sure the best restaurant in Quail Corners Shopping Center. They use fresh ingredients and make outstanding tasting pizza (including the dough). The service is top notch and always welcoming. The seating and bar are really comfy with cool werewolf themed decorations. I highly recommend their salads as well.

v5ccCKlz3wYnvlUkyeLOIA.text: I had lunch there this afternoon. I was contemplating eating outside on their patio but it was way too hot so indoors I went. The hostess/counter girl was very friendly and sat me right away in a booth. I asked to sit at the bar and she was happy to accommodate me. The gentleman making the pizzas greated me warmly and showed me there nice local beer selection and let me peruse the menu.  Their menu has so many options its almost overwhelming...everything looked delicious.  My 10 inch pizza was perfectly cooked and it overflowed with sundried tomatoes, spinach, and sausage every bite was better than the one before. It was a great lunch. Hope to back next time I am in town.

MVdEAOeFICj_Sypzj3N9Ow.text: We were visiting friends in Charlotte and they recommended Wolfman Pizza. Its decor is literally all Wolfman themed right down to the menus. It is definitely unique.   We each had our own 10" pizza. I got a create your own with regular pizza sauce and lots of different veggies; it was good, the crust was amazing and not greasy at all. The others in our party got the "chickenstein" pizza; all that got it seemed satisfied. We also had someone order the baked potato pizza, which is served with sour cream on the side. She said it was amazing.  We went on a Saturday afternoon for lunch and only one waitress was working, so the wait was slow when it came to refills on drinks or if you asked for additional sauce on the side. Overall unique ambience, ok service and really good pizza.

htHJOFvAWEKx0dGCOgS0-w.text: Very good pizza.  Stopped in here between travel baseball games.  It is right across the street from Park Sharon complex.    My son got a pepperoni pizza.  He devoured it. :-0  I got the Thai Chicken... from their menu... Asian chili, diced chicken, roasted red peppers, mozzarella, scallions, bean sprouts and homemade Thai sauce. garnished with cilantro.  It was an unusual combination of flavors on a pizza but it worked.  Staff was friendly as well.

MtPQhfAscCl4r9brgLYoxw.text: I had heard good things about this place from several people and we finally had the chance to try it.   We were seated right away when we arrived. We started off with an order of the Styx with marinara, sun-dried tomato pesto, and cheesey artichoke as our sauces. The sticks themselves were just ok. They lacked flavor. The marinara was also just ok. The pesto was very good and the cheesy artichoke was definitely our favorite.   For our meal, we split a 16" pizza. We got half Thai Chicken and half White Wolf with sausage added. The Thai Chicken was delicious. Our waiter recommended the White Wolf, but we didn't like it very much. It didn't have much flavor at all.   If you're looking for a good pizza place with unique flavors, I'd definitely recommend coming here!

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. 16&#34; with half White Wolf with sausage (left) and half Thai Chicken (right)

ieuI9wm72K2sWilF3_gR2A.text: My husband and I love this place!! It's in our neighborhood so we can walk. We always get a pizza that's half Thai chicken and the other half try something different. The Thai chicken pizza is awesome!!! Every time we've gone it's been a great experience

nJhXfwygOA-MS6zgPYnFOQ.text: So good, we ate there two days in a row on a short trip to Charlotte. Fast service with a great selection of specialty pies.

MvAtwZM7Bs0-VFAD3HmP0g.text: Today, I was going to be a really good boy. I was going to pull into Quail Corners Shopping Center to check out the Ilios Noches restaurant there. I was going to get a NO GUILT salad.   But when I pulled into the lot, I spotted WOLFMAN PIZZA.  The good intentions went out the window.   I loved Wolfman the very minute I walked thru the door.  It was visually alluring and the booths and bar stools were inviting!  I was a little sad that I was alone today, as it would have been charming to share the atmosphere and share a pizza.  So, I thought that I would order a 10 inch veg-0-matic pizza and eat half of it.  Surely, my hard working other half at home would enjoy the uneaten half for dinner,   Well, that's not how it worked out. I scarfed down the entire thing and had to order another one to bring home!  That crust was PERFECT.  It was really perfect!  Not too thin and not too thick. Perfect. The veggies and toppings could not have been better. I rarely eat pizza cause I am at the age when every bite goes to the mid-section. Oink oink oink.  Today was my once year splurge and SPLURGE I did!  Great service.  Cozy little atmosphere.   Couldn't have been better in any size, shape, form, or crust.

H-MVJ8EnR8R8ai_PaXSxgA.text: Great Pie... my kids love it... eat here about 2 times a month.. I usually do take out and it's always hot...

WhfBp0quHvEELjCmKjB31A.text: Best pizza I have had in the Carolinas.  These guys know what is up.  Nothing fancy, nothing unusual, just great pizza and a great beer selection.  Get some!

RzYB6NZQzQSMUscOD4QEHA.text: Great Pizza, Free WiFi, great Atmosphere.  Wolfman is cool.  They have a newspaper and cool menu.  My daughter loves the Wolf-bites appetizers. Indoor and Outdoor seating.   Great for families an friends.  Cool memorabilia on the walls.  Clap for the Wolfman.  We rate their record high!

Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wolf Bites
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Panoramic Kitchen

GcicnHO55DYFsin1qiE2eA.text: We love Wolfman Pizza but they need to work on customer service. When you mess up a customers order and they have to wait another 15 minutes for the correct meal an apology goes a long way rather than making the customer feel like it's their fault. Not cool.

yfsr72fyMoPX2wlzVQJrkw.text: Wolfman Pizza is one of those underrated spots in a not-really neighborhood that just cranks out consistent, quality pizza. The Lady and I used to live right next to here and every time we find ourselves back around our stomping grounds, gosh darn it I can't resist the allure of the Wolf.   If you've never stopped by here, the whole place is werewolf themed. You'd be surprised at just how many werewolf movies there are. You sit down and the menus are these newspaper-esque folds where the story on the front is a satirical story about werewolf, you open the menu and most menu items are wolf themed... they do a great job of theming. All themes aside, I wouldn't give this place 5 stars if it weren't for the food. My personal favorites are the Thai Chicken Pizza and the BBQ Chicken, but sometimes I stray.. like this last time, I got the Big Bad Wolf. Point is, you can't go wrong here. Sometimes The Lady and I order their breadsticks with dipping sauces (don't miss out on the cheesy artichoke dip or the sundried tomato pesto). And I don't think I've ever had a bad or even sub-par experience here! Wolfmans will ALWAYS have a special place in my heart and stomach. And fridge.   As a closer, another draw is the small array of local beers - they have specials on Tuesdays where any draft is $3. Where else can you get that?!?

kjJ0gGEdwpxV1wTn6MoE-w.text: How have I not written a review for this place yet? It is my favorite pizza place in Charlotte!   They have amazing flavors, amazing pizza, everything cooked to perfection.  To date, been here 15+ times, and EVERY time the pizza is perfect.   They even have one of my favorite beer on tap! (OMB Hornets Nest)

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. TONS of toppings.

cyZoX3a9P6NIm9TPNthaUg.text: Good solid pizza and Mon-Wed $3 local drafts, cant go wrong here. Atmosphere is laid back but cozy.

xLiR3M-JUAa5H8NRgD4_rQ.text: Had a better experience here for date night with the hubs. The pizza was delicious and the service was good. But the hostess area is pretty confusing. Came in and no one greeted us. Didn't know if we had to wait and put our name on the list or what but there were several others waiting. I finally gave them our name and saw there were 3 other groups ahead of us. Since it was just me and my husband, they told us they had a two top ready for us. I saw on the list that a group ahead of us was also a party of 2. I asked them if that party shouldn't have it first and they were super confused. That party of 2 ended up taking it but if it wasn't for me, we would of gotten sat before them which wouldn't of been fair. Other that that the food was good.

photos.caption: Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Meat!!
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Beef and mushroom
Photo of Wolfman Pizza - Charlotte - Charlotte, NC, United States. Hot buffalo wings

sM1sX2cW6IZscd2tPmrkRg.text: How have I not reviewed this place yet!? I used to live around the corner from here and it was our go-to place for "I don't feel like cooking tonight". For eat-in or take-out, this place is still one of my favorites for personal pizza.  As a vegetarian, my two favorites are the Bella (Lugosi) and the Veg-o-matic. The Bella has an Alfredo base rather than a red sauce and is so creamy and comforting... a mild flavor, but a great go-to. The veggie is nice if you're looking for a bit more punch in your pizza. It has a traditional red sauce and banana peppers. I've also had all of the other veggie pizzas and honestly, they are all good.  The service is great and the place has a small home-town restaurant vibe to it. There are probably about 4-5 booths and 4-5 tables so the staff is always nearby to refill your water or get you another beer. They also started recognizing us after we'd been a few times haha.  The beer menu is small but local, with usually 5-6 beers on tap at any given time. Some local staples and some more adventurous options are available. Plus, if you go on a Tuesday, they have $3 drafts!

neqJhuKZTWhVWvIFtXpudQ.text: We love it here! Awesome beer specials during the week... Monday through Wednesday.. this is a great neighborhood bar. Definitely one of our go to restaurants. Very casual and you can always find a neighbor here. Can't beat their pizza and salad!

3c6ZMu1OlBfaYcJFEge-gw.text: I've never made it inside. As soon as I spotted the staff out back smoking I left the area before I died from asthma attack.

dfW7SELB64mevVlsm7WQHg.text: Amazing food with great service. The wolf bites are truly a wonderful original. Try the speciality pizzas.

mxc8U93umRRlsS4mOhWVmw.text: I was in town for work and a coworker suggested this place for dinner. It was excellent! Great service, awesome week night draft beer deal and very good pizza! We all enjoyed our time here and would recommend it.
